conversation.text: I think I've got just the Massachusetts movie for you! How about "Hitch" (2005)? It's a fun, light-hearted romantic comedy that takes place in Hollywood during the summer of '62, but it also features some great scenes set in Boston and Cambridge, Massachusetts. Plus, Will Smith stars as the charming but awkward date coach Albert Brooks - I think you'll really enjoy it!

Alfred Hitchcock himself stars in the film, which adds an extra layer of fun for fans of his work.
